assetProfile.address2: 5th Floor Kamala Mills Compound Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Welspun Enterprises Limited engages in the engineering, procurement, and construction of infrastructure development projects in India. It operates in two segments, Infrastructure, and Oil and Gas. The company develops and operates roads and highways, and water and urban infrastructure projects on build, operate, and transfer basis; and operates and maintains projects for the transportation sector. It is also involved in the oil and gas exploration activities. The company was formerly known as Welspun Projects Limited and changed its name to Welspun Enterprises Limited in May 2015. Welspun Enterprises Limited was founded in 1976 and is based in Mumbai, India.
